title: Negotiate like the pros. Vol. 4
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Negotiation
Agriculture, Business, Commerce & Industry/Negotiation in business
description: Never pay too much, settle for too little or give in too soon again! This seminar presentation by John Patrick Doolan looks at how to get what you want from negotiations. What you'll learn includes ways to make your brainstorming sessions even more productive, dealing with emotional outbursts at the bargaining table and avoiding the 13 mistakes amatueur negotiators make.
